issue.title: [CF 499] Something REALLY bad happened
issue.body:
When clicking on Group Settings:

Error occured in: Global
Count: 1
Message: TellMeWhen: Something REALLY bad happened that should not have happened. This isn't a non-critical error anymore, so please report this to Cybeloras!  a: icon  b:
Debug:
   TellMeWhen\TellMeWhen.lua:2984: Assert()
   ...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:5573:
      ...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:5564
   (tail call): ?

   ...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3438: NotifyChanges()
   [string "*:OnLoad"]:5: OnClick()
   ...ace\AddOns\TellMeWhen_Options\TellMeWhen_Options.lua:3417: TabClick()
   [string "*:OnClick"]:1:
      [string "*:OnClick"]:1


> Posted by CurseForge user AmeroGer | Imported from CurseForge issue #499 | Raw

comments.body:
Now I'm completely confused. Could you post the export string of the entire profile that this is happening with? Somehow you have a text layout that is keyed as "icon" instead of "icon1".

"icon1" should be the only normal key for text layouts, all others should be random letters, symbols, and numbers, such as ",?yX(oV%h9(+".

Either way, it is a problem in the code that is causing this - not your fault.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

> Posted by CurseForge user yeahno

I also need you to post the export string for the profile that this is happening for.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

alright, i'll figure out a way of how to share it tomorrow morning. it contains 40 groups though :p


> Posted by CurseForge user yeahno

Just use the import/export interface at the bottom of the icon editor to export your profile to a string, and then copy it to your clipboard.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Nevermind. Should be fixed in r514, let me know if it isn't.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
